item.description: The Association of Biotechnology Led Enterprises (ABLE) conducted its’ 5th edition of Biotechnology Entrepreneurship Student Team (BEST) event, in collaboration with the Department of Biotechnology in Bangalore from October 9th to 13th.

item.title: BioVision introduces DiaEasy™ Dialyzer tubes - the most user friendly dialysis sets on the market.
item.description: Biovision is very excited to introduce the DiaEasy™ Dialyzer tubes product line in our protein extraction and purification portfolio.

item.title: Good news for drug delivery researchers: AbboMax offers a portfolio of liposome reagents
item.description: Liposomes are artificially-prepared vesicles that are made out of the same material as a cell membrane, a lipid bilayer, used as vehicles for drug delivery. AbboMax offers innovative liposome reagents with a large number of lipid compositions.

item.description: BioVision is very excited to announce the launch of the first edition of this latest brochure titled: “Epigenetics Research Tools”.

item.title: BPS Bioscience, Inc. Announces HCV profiling Service and New Tools for HCV Research
item.description: BPS Bioscience, Inc. (“BPS”) announces the addition of a panel of 6 protease enzymes for identifying small molecule inhibitors of the Hepatitis C virus (HCV). These unique enzymes are also available for custom screening and profiling services.

item.title: New England Biolabs® Sponsors Upcoming Masquerade Benefit for ArtCorps®

item.title: Enhanced betatrophin and type 1 diabetes research via sample preparation reagent AlbuVoid™
item.description: The article titled, “Increased circulating levels of betatrophin in individuals with long-standing type 1 diabetes” utilized AlbuVoid™’s albumin depletion protocol for removing albumin from plasma samples

item.title: ReproTech Founder Receives American Association of Tissue Banks Award
item.description: The American Association of Tissue Banks recognized Russell Bierbaum, ReproTech, Ltd. founder and former President, for his contributions to the tissue banking industry this week at its annual meeting.

item.title: SalutarisMD Wet AMD Treatment - Long Term Positive Outcomes Presented at Ophthalmology Futures Forum
item.description: At the Ophthalmology Futures European Forum yesterday, results were presented from a cohort study evaluating the use of a minimally invasive retrobulbar episcleral brachytherapy device developed by Salutaris Medical Devices, Ltd.
